sys_hub_flow.name: (OLD) QUEUE_SSC_SyncSnowComputer

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: If we have MACs to check, then ask Armis now whether any of the computer's MACs are applicable.
We have a link, queue an update for Armis.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Delay the current operation for one minute, when we'll try it again. By the time we get back around to this, we'll have evaluated the macs.
Check whether we have a link already.

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance.comment: Find all of the device's MACs and queue

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: If no link exists and we're on the first try, we need to ask Armis if there's an existing record, then sechedule a second try.
"For Each" is actually just one, we just have to put it in a loop to access it

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Queue a top-priority MAC linking request.

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: If we've already checked the MACs and they came back negative, then we know we have to push a new entry over to Armis.

sys_hub_flow_input.label: snow_computer
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_450ed70b1be9d0104be764e8bc4bcb04

sys_hub_flow_input.label: operation
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_450ed70b1be9d0104be764e8bc4bcb04

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Delay the current operation for one minute, when we'll try it again. By the time we get back around to this, we'll have evaluated the macs.
Check whether we have a link already.
Queue a top-priority MAC linking request.

sys_hub_sub_flow_instance.comment: Find all of the device's MACs and queue

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: If we have MACs to check, then ask Armis now whether any of the computer's MACs are applicable.
We have a link, queue an update for Armis.
If no link exists and we're on the first try, we need to ask Armis if there's an existing record, then sechedule a second try.
"For Each" is actually just one, we just have to put it in a loop to access it
If we've already checked the MACs and they came back negative, then we know we have to push a new entry over to Armis.
